original_text: ‘The Lord saw everything that you were doing. You must surely realize that! He knew about the things that you, your ancestors, your kings, your leaders and all the people were doing. He remembered all the sacrifices that you offered to other gods in the towns of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 너희가 너희 선조와 너희 왕들과 고관들과 유다 땅 백성이 유다 성읍들과 예루살렘 거리에서 분향한 일을 여호와께서 기억하셨고 그의 마음에 떠오른 것이 아닌가

sentences.original_text: The Lord saw everything that you were doing.
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너희가 행하는 모든 것을 보셨다.

sentences.original_text: He knew about the things that you, your ancestors, your kings, your leaders and all the people were doing.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너와 너의 조상들, 너의 왕들, 너의 지도자들과 모든 백성들이 행하던 일들을 알고 계셨다.

sentences.original_text: He remembered all the sacrifices that you offered to other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희가 다른 신들에게 바쳤던 모든 제물을 기억하셨다

sentences.original_text: in the towns of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem.
